https://store.steampowered.com/app/11408.title: Morbid: The Seven Acolytes

https://store.steampowered.com/app/17917.title: Kingdoms Conquer / 攻城天下

Recruit troops, build the battle lineup, conquer and expand your territory, all is to make your realm grown more powerful and finally reign over all the realms! Write your own history and become the one true king of all the kingdoms!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/12059.title: Alwa's Legacy

https://store.steampowered.com/app/49557.title: ConflictCraft
https://store.steampowered.com/app/49557.description: Defend and attack at same time! You’ll need to capture as many bases as you can. There are different types ranging from anti-air guns, turrets and radio towers to nuclear silos. Your offensive capabilities consist of tanks, attack helicopters and dropships. Deeply rewarding strategic warfare.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/54926.title: Alwa's Awakening
https://store.steampowered.com/app/54926.description: Use your magic staff and progress through a large interconnected world where you'll solve puzzles, fight enemies and defeat bosses in order to help free the land of Alwa. Explore and uncover the secrets by using your platforming skills in this challenging and charming 8-bit adventure game.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/15317.title: Need for Drive - Open World Multiplayer Racing
https://store.steampowered.com/app/15317.description: Your rivals will do everything they can to stop you from getting to the top – but in this world, there can only be one WINNER. Fight your way past cops and rivals using skill, high-end car tech, and tons of nitrous.
